tagline: An Advanced theme option page that has all the option needed ,custom styles and jQuery tabs
body:
Welcome to my Repository >>>>This is an advanced Theme option page for wordpress Made bu my own hands...it has every thing you want (text boxes,textareas,select,custom styled checkboxes, radio fields,Image uploader,and a colorpicker )`
` this Option page was made to be easy and light
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Wordpress-theme-option-page
